A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I honestly think this movie is a collection of missed chances wrapped in a very expensive and flashy package. Almost every plot point was cheaply concluded\, answering questions with out of place humor and prequel style bluntness. I think they handled characters poorly and cheapened a lot of the lore and mythology that made this franchise great. Maybe I'm just taking it too seriously\, this is a good movie if you just want some popcorn but I wanted a great Star Wars movie and this just didn't do the job.
